text: To add to the above - is it possible to get the custom object id in an automated email which is triggered from a workflow? So if I have a custom object “event” and i want to send an email 2 days before which uses crm_associations to list relationships, is there a way to get the event object id?
It should show up when previewing for a contact yes
The event id should be accessible in the same way. Can I ask if you are using the programmable email beta to achieve this? I was assuming you were
Yeah I am (as far as i know - I get a little message next to publish button asking for feedback) - i enabled it by adding a prop to the comment block. Not sure if thats enough?

So i’m assuming something like this should work, right?
```{% set associated_objects = crm_associations(hs_object_id, "USER_DEFINED", 56) %}```
